metadata.title: CVE-2023-41360 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in FRRouting FRR through 9.0. bgpd/bgp_packet.c canread the initial byte of the ORF header in an ahead-of-stream situation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-41360` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

frr - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1
frr-pythontools - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1
frr-rpki-rtrlib - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1
frr-snmp - 8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: frr package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8.4.4-1.1ubuntu1').
